choices.text:
when I was 6, my sister was half my age. Now I am 80. How old is my sister now? Calculate this step by step.
1) When you were 6, your sister's age was (6 - 3 =) 3 years younger than yours.
2) So when you were both 6, your sister's age was (6 - 3 =) 3 years old.
3) Now that you are 80 years old, your sister's current age is (80 + 3 =) 83 years old.
4) Therefore, the answer is 83.
